title: DATA-SHS 2025: Web scraping crash course
text:
Welcome to the repository of the crash course (3h) in web scraping.
Slides. You can find the slides here.
First webpage. The webpage I/we created during the class is in the folder my-webpage.
Selectors. To play with selectors: see the website with the game.
Exercises. The small exercises with the Members of the European Parliament is in the file scraping-inclass.py.
I hope you enjoyed the class. Have fun now!
